name: Angon: The Grim Age
summary: In Angon: The Grim Age, strategy faces a medieval apocalyptic world about survival and politics. Enter into the journey that leads the world to chaos and misery, exploring unique places on the wasted land of Eradon. Take decisions that can shape the destiny of the people, battle on turn-based old RPG style and immerse yourself in the rich and deep lore with unique npcs that actually cares with your actions.
